coordinate_rules.rule: All coordinates must be in pixels
x1 must be less than x2
y1 must be less than y2
All coordinates must be within image dimensions
Bounding boxes should tightly fit the element content

element_identification_rules.rule: Every visible structural element must be identified
Heading levels must reflect visual hierarchy
Images must include descriptive content text
Tables should be identified as single elements

content_extraction_rules.rule: Extract complete text content for text elements
Preserve special characters and formatting indicators
For images, provide descriptive alt text
Include URLs for link elements when visible

ordering_rules.rule: Order must be sequential without gaps
Headers come before body content at same level
